titleStmt.title: Lucta Iacobi: or, A bonefire for His Maiesties double deliuerie, from the deluge in Perth, the 5. of August, 1600. And the doomesday of Britaine, the 5. of Nouember. 1605. Seene and allowed
titleStmt.author: Univocè-catholicus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[reede] for William Welby, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Gray-hound,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The diluge of Perth, and the doomesday of Britaine.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Gray-hound
